member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR
member.summary: Defines error status codes for the Media Engine.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR_ABORTED
member.summary: The process of fetching the media resource was stopped at the user's request.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR_NETWORK
member.summary: A network error occurred while fetching the media resource.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR_DECODE
member.summary: An error occurred while decoding the media resource.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ERR_SRC_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: The media resource is not supported.

summary.para: An error occurred while encrypting the media resource.
